message: http://tumblr.com sign-up is pretty nice / clear, as well.
Where do folks find design inspiration? What are some great all-around sites?
I've always liked mailchimp.com, but not sure if I'm digging the new homepage.
Nice flickr pool, as well: http://www.flickr.com/groups/boagworldinspiration/pool/
http://designshack.co.uk/gallery
And of course, http://dribbble.com/shots/popular/
I find a lot of stuff on Forrst (http://forrst.com/) now. I'm not exactly a UI designer but it's a good mix of design and UI code.
Things I don't find inspiring are usually titled something like "19,374 webpage headers to inspire you" lol
@partlysean adding that to my Google Reader, thanks!
@druwynings Agreed. Dribbble is a great source for endless inspiration. They recently opened the signup for those who just want to follow and like shots. Posting shots still requires an invite.
I find forrst and dribbble good for finding out what the top trends in web design are at any given time. For more general stuff I look at www.notcot.org and www.ffffound.com
Also there's www.littlebigdetails.com for little interaction and UX bits.
www.beautifulpixels.com is a great site too.
It's not web design per se, but gotta add http://svpply.com/ - fits the bill for inspiration. Beautiful stuff.
Wow - fantastic suggestions - thanks @druwynings, @bjtitus, @spencer & @partlysean

http://flickr2tag.drikin.com/?query=Web%20Desgin
I think Flickr tells us the hint.
New ffffound-esque site: http://designspiration.net/
this is inspiration for what not to do http://yourlogomakesmebarf.com
I'm using this iphone app: http://getgalleried.com/
I find that any of the http://envato.com/ sites, and also the articles on http://abduzeedo.com/ to be really inspiring, but lately I've been using dribbble a lot more for inspiration.
http://tumblr.com/
http://www.swiss-miss.com/
http://www.imgspark.com/
Anything with a good palette is always nice. Good sites are http://welovetypography.com, http://yayeveryday.com
patterntap.com !
urgh, sorry! getting used to convore. http://patterntap.com/
surprised this isnt here.. http://www.thebestdesigns.com/
hey
Surprised no one mentioned DeviantART http://www.deviantart.com/ .
I don't know how spammy it will get later, but I am enjoying Fab.com http://fab.com/s53y53
I enjoy http://www.siteinspire.com
I really like http://styleboost.com/
@natasha360 +1 for deviantart
http://blog.inspiredmark.com/ + http://designerscouch.org/ :)
